snippet: The Dallas Cowboys will open their N.F.L. season Wednesday against the Giants, who knocked them out of the playoffs last year and have owned the series lately.
abstract: Dallas Cowboys are preparing to open their NFL season against the New York Giants, who knocked them out of the playoffs last year.
lead_paragraph: The Dallas Cowboys will open their N.F.L. season Wednesday against the Giants, who knocked them out of the playoffs last year and have owned the series lately.

headline.seo: Cowboys Can Say Little About Current State of Rivalry With Giants
headline.main: From Cowboys, the Grinding of Teeth
headline.print_headline: From Cowboys, the Grinding of Teeth
